name: Space Wreckers
description:
Join the space battle in our thrilling incremental clicker game!

Play in your web browser and defend your spaceship from waves of enemy ships.

Use your mouse to shoot down the approaching foes before they reach you.
Can you survive the relentless assault and emerge victorious? Play now and find out!

Credits:

Aryan: HTML, CSS and JavaScript

(https://nucleartachyon.itch.io)

Hardik: Audio Assets

(https://haardik04.itch.io)

Sagar: Visual Assets

(https://dokutaiyo.itch.io)
